snippet: Within the slow recovery in the United States, there is a wide gap in the performance of individual states.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column notes that within slow economic recovery in United States, there is a wide gap in the performance of individual states; looking at three measures--jobs, home prices and highway miles driven--notes that North Dakota has done best, and Florida worst.
lead_paragraph: Within the slow recovery in the United States, there is a wide gap in the performance of individual states.

headline.print_headline: North Dakota Leads on the Road to Recovery
headline.main: North Dakota Leads on the Road to Recovery
